name: Xtreme Sledding Game Free
description:
GET IT WHILE IT’S FREE & HOT!!!!


ONE OF THE TOP APPS OF 2012
TOP 10 WORLDWIDE


EVERYONE’S FAVORITE PAST TIME!

Not Enough time to get the kids out on the slopes? No problem, fun is right at their fingertips with X-Treme Sled Racing. This fun filled action packed adventure will keep them occupied for hours.

Who says you need to grow up? X-Treme Sled Racing takes you back in time re-living wonderful childhood memories, SEE FOR YOURSELF!

Soar through the air as you ride your way through challenging snow covered levels with the sled of your choice! The more coins you collect the more you unlock. X-Treme Sled Racing offers 3 exciting worlds and over 18 challenging levels.

Don’t get left out in the cold download X-Treme Sled Racing Today!

FUN FOR ALL AGES!
CHECK IT OUT FOR FREE NOW
